meanings.definition: A mark or stamp on the back of an object indicating its origin or manufacturer.
meanings.sent1: The backstamp on the vase showed it was made in Italy.
meanings.sent2: I always check the backstamp on my dishes to see where they were made.
meanings.sent3: The detective found a backstamp on the painting revealing its true artist.
meanings.sent4: Her signature was like a backstamp, leaving a lasting impression on the document.
meanings.sent5: The backstamp on the antique coin helped determine its value.

meanings.definition: To mark or stamp the back of an object with identifying information.
meanings.sent1: The artist decided to backstamp each painting with her initials.
meanings.sent2: Before selling the products, they backstamp them with a unique code.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous elf backstamped the cookies with funny faces.
meanings.sent4: His dedication to quality backstamps his work with excellence.
meanings.sent5: The craftsman carefully backstamped each piece with precision.
